test.sql: SELECT * FROM Employees e WHERE e.EmployeeID = SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID < SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID > SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID <> SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID <= SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID >= SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID + SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID - SOME (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees)

expectedError.text: SOME, ANY and ALL can only be applied on =, <>, <, <=, >, or >=
SOME, ANY and ALL can only be applied on =, <>, <, <=, >, or >=
